column4: News;Phnom Penh:------ Accommodation for Chinese workers on the Star City condo building project were destroyed by fire at 8 pm on January 23
column5: 2018 in Sen Sok district.------According to witnesses
column6: an explosion was heard from an upper room
column7: where no workers were inside. Then
column9: smoke and flames shot out.------Workers inside the building were evacuated and fire extinguishers were used to try to control the blaze. Police and fire trucks then arrived on the scene
column10: but narrow access made it difficult to reach the fire.------The fire was put out by 9 pm
column11: but the building and everything inside was destroyed.------The fire is believed to have been caused by an electrical fault. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/407812
